text:
*Second Closet is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Second Closet is Canada’s tech-enabled logistics partner built for businesses of all sizes; from small eCommerce merchants to large national retailers. 

We're looking for a strategic, detail-oriented marketer, who will be responsible for our content strategy and become the voice of the company. Reach out if you’re a passionate storyteller with experience writing a variety of types of SEO-driven inbound content and managing an editorial calendar.

If you’re looking to own the content strategy at one of Canada’s fastest-growing companies from end-to-end then this role is for you! It can be fully or partially remote as long as you're based in Canada and will report to the Manager of B2B Growth. 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://boards.greenhouse.io/secondcloset/jobs/5077094002>

<@U01PJJ5G4CC>
